name: Ice climBear
description:
The mighty tale of ClimBear is a must have game on any device for any action arcade fan!

Tons of tricky levels action packed with dangerous spinning blades, fireballs, traps
and evil bosses who will do anything to stop you from completing all the levels and tasks.

Collect the mozarella stick balls along the way to earn extra points and rating,
Find the hidden ones for some extra status aswell!

Super easy to play, fun and really addictive and we all love this game!

Ice ClimBear - the polar iceberg saga where evil lurks around the corner waiting for you to walk right into their traps!

Complete all levels and bosses and save the planet from weirdness!
